articles.content: A systematic review of 57 studies involving more than 250,000 COVID-19 survivors reveals that 54% still had at least one symptom 6 months or more after initial diagnosis or release from the hospital.… [+3723 chars]

articles.author: Josh Dutton
articles.title: New deadly virus strain from bats emerges in Australia: 'Dangerous to people' - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: A new strain of Hendra virus has been found in a horse near Newcastle prompting warnings.
articles.content:
A new strain of Hendra virus, which is found in flying foxes, has been found in NSW.
The CSIRO said the latest case was found in a horse in Newcastle. There was a Hendra outbreak in 2014 which led t… [+2118 chars]

articles.author: Mansur Shaheen U.S.
articles.title: Fully vaccinated Florida man dies of Covid after month in hospital - Daily Mail
articles.description: Vincent Konidare, 58, of Palm Beach Florida died of COVID-19 last month despite being fully vaccinated and having no serious comorbidities. Cases like this are very rare.
articles.content:
Vincent Konidare (pictured), 58, died of COVID-19 on September 19 despite being fully vaccinated and having no comorbidities
